title: Witcher 3 x Monster Hunter World - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.10.18
description:
Now through December 25, get 30% off any 23andMe kit at http://23andme.com/games
Go to http://lootcrate.com/games and enter my code GAMES to save 30% off your subscription
Get 15% off your first pair at http://meundies.com/gamesdaily

Geralt is coming to Monster Hunter World next year! Plus, Tim answers your Smash Bros. questions.

00:04:00 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Games Showcase was a blast, and something we’re super-proud of. Even if you’ve seen some of the trailers around, we’d love for you to check out the whole show over at: kindafunny.com/showcase
Speaking of, who won the Nintendo Switch and Rival Megagun? Jesus Hernandez (@BrofiusAwesomus)!
HOLIDAY SCHEDULE: We’re here next week, and then off starting on 12/24. We come back Friday, 1/4 for a Kinda Funny Day Stream you aren’t ready for.
The Roper Report   -
00:11:12 - Monster Hunter Makin’ Moves
00:16:36 - Layoffs at Daybreak (H1Z1), Rebekah Valentine GIB
00:19:19 - Warframe Downloaded 1 million times on Switch, RV at GIB
00:22:30 - Bonus Stories - Tim Gettys
00:24:22 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:34:30 - What are your thoughts on these shortcomings that are coming to light, from Smash? Will Nintendo ever develop a game that has fully functional online play? - Leandro
00:38:55 - Let’s address the Koopa in the room: Unlocking characters in Smash Ultimate. - EJ
00:44:50 - Tim, now that Joker has been announced as a DLC character for Smash, does this open the door to characters we would have thought impossible in the past? Is there now a real chance for Goku to be a DLC character? - Ignacio Rojas
00:46:32 - Will we see Persona 5 come to Switch? - BradenAndEggs
00:47:50 - What games do you two have in your back log that you are going to play before the year is up? - Jeffthemaverick
00:49:50 - Squad Up: Brittany(PS4) - britafox
00:50:33 - You‘re Wrong
This week’s host:
MONDAY: Greg and Tim
TUESDAY: Greg and Tim
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Jared
FRIDAY: Greg and Andrea


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
